wikipedia_page.main: Norman William Dobson (5 April 1922 – 2 March 2009) was a British sprint canoer who competed in the late 1940s. He was eliminated in the heats of the K-1 1000 m event at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London. Norman earned his PhD in 1999 from the University of Leicester
